title: Our Intrepid Heroine
description: These are the facts: Our Intrepid Heroine has a unicorn following her about, she can't pronounce 'felicitations', and she's on her way to slay a dragon. A dragon that has killed an entire flock of her fatherâ€™s sheep, three goats and one pig. And a frog.Our Heroine has a sword named 'Death' and a spear called 'Doom'. She is afflicted by the presence of pesky princesses, mysterious Hooded Persons, and noble knights.Narrated by a Narrator who is fond of detours and digressions, this is a short novella with tongue-in-cheek humour and Very Important Tips in hunting dragons that will be sure to stir the curiosity of the eager amateur dragon-hunter.
author: Ness Kingsley
